channel.title: verify virtualbox
channel.description:
Hello i'm trying to verify virtualbox download, sha256sum is fine and i have imported public key but i don't find the signed file anywhere.
Does anyone know where is that signed file? if there is one?

item.title: verify virtualbox
item.dc:creator: 0x1f
item.description:
Direct download for signature: https://download.whonix.org/ova/16.0.5.3/Whonix-XFCE-16.0.5.3.ova.asc
Direct download for public-key: https://www.whonix.org/derivative.asc

Read full topic

item.title: verify virtualbox
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
There is no “special” place. It’s there.

https://www.whonix.org/wiki/VirtualBox/XFCE

Optional: Verify the Whonix ™ Images cryptographically EXPAND

OpenPGP Signature

Use the browser internal per-page search function. After pressing the expand button, search for:

signature

Read full topic

item.title: verify virtualbox
item.dc:creator: Andrew
item.description:
Yes but i don’t find the signed file anywhere. I guess there is not any but maybe a user here know where it is.

Read full topic

item.title: verify virtualbox
item.dc:creator: nyxnor
item.description:
you need to download the signed file on the same place you downloaded the image, continue following the installation procedure.

Read full topic
